title: Suffer of Envy, Resentment Undying
caption:
So nigh he comes,
so weary and weighted.
Gilded and cursed
By infinite scars and wounds.
Within the forests of blossom,
Naught but salves and salvation;
So nigh he comes,
The envious who suffers,
The Undying resented.
So say we all, and so shall it be.
